comment_body:
Honestly a brilliant idea! Really enjoyed this. 

Nitpickiest of nitpicks, though: I wouldn't have used that title because we know from the get-go where the narration is heading. Letting it unfold along the way would leave a stronger impression.
What if "GAMERS, RISE UP!" is code for "undead time"? ğŸ¤”
Ahh.... you left out his buddy Lazerus.
That feel when Jesus is secretly a ghoul from Tokyo Ghoul
I was not expecting that twist! Love it!

Thank you so much! For the compliment and more for the nitpickiest nitpick.ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
I thought about the title but anything related to zombies is too much overdone I was afraid my story could get zombiecasted.ğŸ˜…
"We live in a society" is so much more sinister now.
Furries would be the good guys then?
Ah well... Not confirming his name(ğŸ˜œ) but he could be the second one... The bitten(cured) who rose up....Thank you for the insight. I'll do better research for my next idea.
Thank you so much. This is my first attempt at writing here after lurking for years.
